price: Saa, efri deε wonsa adi ato w’anim no ho nti, na Nyankopͻn deε Onsisi N’akoa.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
